snippet: A debate continued over the deaths of animals on the set of “Luck” the day after HBO announced that it was canceling the show.
abstract: Debate continues over the deaths of horses on the set of HBO series Luck, about the world of horse racing, after network's cancellation of show; HBO says that it maintained highest possible safety standards during production, but animal advocacy group People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals says that it had concerns about unsafe conditions.
lead_paragraph: A debate continued over the deaths of animals on the set of “Luck” the day after HBO announced that it was canceling the show.

keywords.value: People for the Ethical Treatment of Animals
keywords.name: organizations
